overview: After two seasons of flirting with relegation, Atlético de Madrid started the 95/96 season with Radomir Antić as new coach and a limited investment in signings, some of them completely unknown to Spanish fans. With this background, the red and white club joined the small club of the chosen few, those who have won the two most important titles in Spanish football in the same season.
title: El Atleti del doblete
